sentences.english: There is a dangerous side to excessive solitude spent in efforts at meditation.
sentences.chinese: 在冥思苦想中渡過的徹底隱逸暗藏着危險。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 mainly explored literal values of the biographies.
sentences.chinese: 第四章主要是隱逸傳的文學價值的探討。

sentences.english: Like the orchid flower, it typifies the idea of charm in seclusion .
sentences.chinese: 它和蘭花一樣，象徵着隱逸的美。

sentences.english: Too much of it may cause a man to go astray and lose himself in chimeras and illusions.
sentences.chinese: 過分隱逸使人走入歧途，迷失在狂亂幻覺中。

sentences.english: The recluse culture with a long history is a miracle of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 隱逸文化是綻放在中華文化之樹上的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: The traditional hermit culture has an important influence upon the development of the literator gardening.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的隱逸文化對文人園林的發展有着重要影響。

sentences.english: Recluse culture is the cultural complex, which is reflected and spread by the recluses as carriers.
sentences.chinese: 隱逸文化是以隱士爲載體來反映和傳播的文化複合體。

sentences.english: The fourth part mainly discusses the expressive art of xinqiji's rural emotion.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分主要論述辛棄疾田園隱逸情懷的抒寫藝術。

sentences.english: Reclusive idea was one of important themes in lyric verses of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 隱逸思想是元散曲的重要主題之一。

sentences.english: Their different reclusion style decided their different poem character.
sentences.chinese: 三者不同的隱逸風格影響了其詩歌的創作風貌。

sentences.english: Who can wonder those latent lofty men would be so happy when smelling this kind of fragrance?
sentences.chinese: 誰想到山林裏隱逸的高人，聞到了芬芳便滿懷喜悅。

sentences.english: Part Three"the Song Dynasty esthetic culture of reclusion's essential feature".
sentences.chinese: 第三部分“宋代隱逸審美文化的基本特點”。

definition: of noble character and unquestionable integrity (idiom)
that being the case/then/in that case
Chu Ci, the Songs of Chu (ancient book of poems, collected during Han but esp. from country of Chu c. 500 BC)
